features: Easy to alternate between 7" Stool & 9" Stool
To simulate a squatting position, all you have to do is take a seat, put your feet on the toilet stool, and get comfortable.
body.description: The bamboo flip helps align the colon for better elimination. To simulate a squatting position, all you have to do is take a seat, put your feet on the toilet stool, and get comfortable. Prefer the 7" Height, but someone else in the home requires the 9" Height? This Squatty Potty adjusts between both heights with just a flip. It's clever design requires very little effort to accommodate anyone's squatting needs. So simple. Yet so smart. Which size is right for me? The flip stool offers the best of both worlds. 7″ Height is the most comfortable for most people. For those with comfort height toilets the 9″ Height is sometimes preferred. Children also do better with the 9″ Height.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: One Stool, Two Heights This versatile toilet stool can flip to 7” or 9” in height. Perfect for any toilet size. Nature’s Call, the Natural Way The Bamboo Flip Toilet Stool is made from natural bamboo. This makes it durable yet comfortable to use! Adding bamboo to your bathroom is a great way to create a warm, beautiful space. Studying the Squat When it’s time to do your business, why not join 90% of people who eliminate strain by using the Squatty Potty? Not only that, 85% of users experience increased emptying of their bowels and 71% spend less time on the toilet. It’s the clinically proven way to better your bowel movements!

Join the Bowel Movement Let’s face it, in a world of ergonomic technology the toilet needed an upgrade. We think Squatty Potty is the solution. Join us! How Our Bodies Were Designed to “Go” There is a better way to poop! Human bodies perform more efficiently if we squat when we poop, which will unkink your colon. Our toilet stools support your legs at the proper angle, which creates a squat (legs at the proper angle: 35°) while you sit comfortably on the toilet seat. Simply sit, lift your feet onto the stool then go poop. Your colon will be open, allowing you to eliminate completely. For different body sizes, flip the stool to a 7" or 9" height. Reposition your body from 90° to 35° to naturally loosen your puborectalis muscle Reduce time spent on the toilet Easily eliminate the strain Weight limit: 250lb Dimensions (low height): 9 1/4"D × 17 1/2"W × 7 3/4"H Dimensions (taller height): 9 1/4"D × 17 1/2"W × 9 1/2"H

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 10, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great Aesthetic and Durability
reviews.reviewText: We bought the stool to replace another cheaper brand that was plastic. The quality and durability is definitely noticeable. This stool being a nice neutral bamboo makes it a great option to fit into almost any bathroom theme. The ability to provide two different heights is also a great option for varied height families or toilets. Very easy to assemble and only takes a few minutes. Very happy with this purchase! We even decided to buy a second as a gift!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 24, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Lightweight but sturdy
reviews.reviewText: This item is small, lightweight, yet is very sturdy. It also has two different heights in case of different toilet heights. Putting it together was easy and it conveniently pushes under the front of the toilet when not in use. Works well and has improved bathroom time significantly. I would definitely buy again.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 29, 2023
reviews.reviewText: My brother asked for this squatty potty for Christmas. My sister-in-law hesitated to let him get one because they are often an eyesore. Her hesitation was quickly gone when she saw how well-made it was and she loved that the wood could blend well into any bathroom. It was easy to assemble and is the perfect height to serve its intended purpose.Can also double as a stool to help toddlers use the toilet independently.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 5, 2024
reviews.reviewText: My physical therapist recommended for me and let me tell you, I can’t thank him enough. Doesn’t take up a lot of room, fits right next to toilet and wall. Works great as a stool to reach a shelf also. No more issues since I’ve been using! Thank you again Mr. Mike for the recommendation!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 14, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Easy Installation — Don’t Overtighten Screws
reviews.reviewText: Very impressed that it arrived two days earlier than expected. Installation was easy, and was packaged with extra parts and an Allen wrench. I did have to loosen some screws to put the caps on though. Otherwise the caps fell right out. The bamboo looks great on my bathroom, and will be easy to clean. I love how it’s height adjustable! Works as expected.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 26, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars I love this thing
reviews.reviewText: I've had this for years now and I love it. Looks good, perfect height, and it works really well for my body. Every time I travel I'm always sad that I don't have a Squatty Potty.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 2, 2019
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars The Bamboo Flip from Squatty Potty not only looks great, it works well too!
reviews.reviewText: I have been a fan of the Original Squatty Potty Toilet Stool for years, and I wanted purchase more stools for additional toilets in my home. As much as I liked the Original's functionality, I thought it would look cheap to put a white plastic stool in guest bathrooms, so I did some research. I saw that Squatty Potty also develops a similar product, but instead of plastic, they use bamboo and call it the "Bamboo Flip." This is because from a simple flip of the product, the stool can either be 7" or 9" tall from the ground. For typical toilets, a 7" stool works, but if you have higher toilets (or children), the 9" setting would be optimal.When the Bamboo Flip arrived, it came in a box with the necessary tools and hardware to personally assemble it. This called for 8 screws, screw covers, and rubber guards to protect your floors. Installation realistically took about 15-20 minutes to follow the instructions, make sure all of the pieces were in the correct location, and using the tools and hardware to put it all together. I purchased 3 of these stools, and one of them couldn't get assembled properly due to warping of the wood. Keep this in mind! If you assemble your stool, and you see any pieces of wood bending or not fitting together properly, contact Amazon as soon as possible for an exchange or a refund.Overall, the Bamboo Flip from Squatty Potty looks a lot better than the Original Squatty Potty with its cheap white plastic look. It has a lot less surface area for your feet compared to the Original, so keep this in mind. There is also a slight decline on the surface of the stool where your feet sit compared to the flat surface of the Original. I personally like this product, and I would recommend all humans to have some sort of stool in their bathrooms going forward! The Bamboo Flip is less of an eye-sore compared to the Original for guests, but both of them do their jobs well.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 7, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Easy to assemble
reviews.reviewText: I really like the way you can adjust height. It is lightweight but sturdy. I found it to be very easy to assemble.
Es muy estable y muy buen diseño al poderlo usar de dos alturas diferentes

Excellent little stool for stooling lol. It’s very pretty considering what it’s used for and tucks away very well. Was easy to put together once you figure out how each piece goes together and it very sturdy. The price is a little high even though I got it on sale. There’s quite an angle that you have to get used to but I would definitely recommend it.
Y resistencia.Con dos alturas.Fácil de montar
I weigh 73kg and I can just stand on it and squat on it without any support.It looks nice but the logos on there are a bit gaudy, that could've been made a bit more subtle.
Belle manufacture,efficace. Je ne regrette pas mon achat.
